author: Daniel Bondar
comment: If u guys add keyboard typing, this would be 5 stars

author: Carlos Figueira
comment: This is a nice app for the smartwatch, works great there. For the mobile app I would suggest: 1) Let send notes to smartwatch (would give one more star) 2) Have a paid version to get rid of ads! I'll pay for it! (would give give stars!)

author: Joni Pranata
comment: Please add a word counter beside the character counter. Plz plz plz

author: Eric H
comment: I haven't worked out where it saves to phone on iOS. Pretty good otherwise

author: Libby Emerick
comment: good and helpful but keep is better

author: Anja Samsung
comment: Please help... forgot assword and I had important stuff there

reply.author: NUmero
reply.content:
1. Back up the contents of the note. Please confirm that the backup was successful. 
2. Uninstall the application in Notepad and install again.If the backup is not successful, notes can not restore.
3. Now you have to select Settings> Backup> Restore Notes, I will restore the notes from backup. 
4. After restoring please reset the password.

author: S M
comment: You're so close to having the best note taking app. Most of what makes this one so great is it's simplicity so don't add too many features, but one that every note taking app currently is missing is the ability to take notes via a keyboard in Wear. Allow keyboard input and yours will be set above the rest (especially now that 2.0 has such an easy to use keyboard).

author: Farkas Gabor
comment: This app would be perfect, it actually works but it's missing something essential: the ability to send notes from phone to wear. Creating and saving notes on Wear works, sending them to phone works, but since typing on phone is much easier and faster, I'd like to do the opposite: to create notes on phone and send them to my watch. Without this function it's useless to me. If you could add this feature, I'll revise this feedback to 5 starts, I would also pay for a premium version because I truly need it.
Great note app, actually my favorite on the play store. If there was a way to pay once and remove ads I would pay it, but because there's no way to remove the ads, I'm not going use it.

author: Steve G
comment: Great app, would be nice to be able to remove the ads.
